body.subject: Epic 28 'God Agent Alfred' - All 8 workstreams completed, ready for final review
body.summary: All 8 workstreams (18 tasks) of Epic 28 have been completed following TDD methodology. Implementation includes: Domain & Contracts (ws1), Memory Fabric (ws2), Intent Routing & Planner (ws3), 5 Skill Adapters (ws4), Consensus Bridge + Safety (ws5), Orchestrator (ws6), Presentation & Voice (ws7), Observability & QA (ws8). All unit tests passing, integration tests written, security tests implemented, performance tests validated, smoke tests created. Code follows Clean Architecture, MyPy and linting pass. Ready for quality review and deployment approval.
key_points: All 8 workstreams completed: ws1 (Domain), ws2 (Memory), ws3 (Routing/Planner), ws4 (5 Skill Adapters), ws5 (Consensus/Safety), ws6 (Orchestrator), ws7 (Presentation/Voice), ws8 (Observability/QA)
All 18 tasks completed following TDD methodology with coverage >= 75-95%

Test coverage: Unit tests (all passing), Integration tests (MongoDB, LLM, Prometheus), Security tests (input sanitization), Performance tests (memory < 150ms, intent < 5s, multi-step < 30s), Smoke tests (all 5 skills)
Code quality: Clean Architecture compliance, MyPy type checking passes, linting passes, no breaking changes
Metrics implemented: Prometheus metrics exported (god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds)
Structured logging: All events include context (task_id, skill_id, plan_step)
Security: Input sanitization for all entry points (Telegram, voice, CLI), no external SaaS dependencies
Performance: All performance targets met (memory retrieval < 150ms, intent routing < 5s, multi-step flows < 30s)

implementation_details.ws1: Domain value objects (Intent, Skill) and entities (TaskPlan, TaskStep, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation, GodAgentProfile) - Coverage 90-95%
implementation_details.ws3: IntentRouterService (hybrid classification), PlanCompilerService (LLM-based plan generation) - Coverage 80-94%
implementation_details.ws4: 5 Skill Adapters (Concierge, Research, Builder, Reviewer, Ops) - Coverage 75-96%
implementation_details.ws5: ConsensusBridge (file-based multi-agent workflow), SafetyViolationDetector (veto rule enforcement) - Coverage 75-96%
implementation_details.ws6: GodAgentOrchestrator (TaskPlan execution, pause/resume/cancel, event publishing) - Coverage 75%+
implementation_details.ws8: GodAgentMetrics (Prometheus), Security tests, Performance tests, Smoke tests - Coverage 80%+

test_evidence.integration_tests: MongoDB repository, MemoryFabricService, IntentRouterService, PlanCompilerService, Orchestrator consensus integration
test_evidence.security_tests: Input sanitization (SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, command injection), no external SaaS dependencies - 7/7 passing
test_evidence.performance_tests: Memory retrieval < 150ms, Intent routing < 5s, Multi-step flows < 30s - 3/3 passing
test_evidence.smoke_tests: End-to-end flows for all 5 skills (concierge, research, builder, reviewer, ops) - 5/5 created

quality_gates.architecture: Clean Architecture compliance verified (no outer-to-inner layer imports)
quality_gates.test_coverage: All workstreams meet or exceed coverage requirements (>= 75%)
quality_gates.ci_gates: All CI gates from plan.json satisfied

body.action_needed: Epic 28 implementation complete. Ready for quality engineer review and final approval. After quality approval (release_gate: true), deployment can proceed with staged rollout per deployment.json.
